attributes.action: Make it illegal for MPs and their families to have private healthcare.
attributes.background:
Labour insists the NHS is underfunded, while the Conservatives insist it is not underfunded.
Whatever the truth, if MPs and their immediate families are reliant on the NHS (making MPs the same as other people), then we can be assured that all those in Parliament will protect the NHS.

rejection.details: This is a choice for individual MPs and their families, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
